---

## AUDIT-10 vs DASI

When comparing two crucial questionnaires in the field of psychology and social sciences - Alcohol Use Disorder Identification Test (AUDIT-10) and Drug, Alcohol and Self Injury Questionnaire (DASI), psychologists and researchers alike often find the harmonisation process time-consuming and challenging. Thanks to Harmony, an incredibly beneficial software specifically developed to aid in such instances, the harmonisation of AUDIT-10 vs DASI can be significantly simplified. Utilizing technology in the form of natural language processing and generative AI models, Harmony remarkably eases and accelerates the traditionally tedious process. Harmony's potency lies in its capacity to accurately compare instruments like AUDIT-10 vs DASI and provide a percentage match between each item. Essentially, this eliminates the headache of having to manually go through reams of data to harmonize different items. It supports multiple languages, too, which significantly extends the possibilities of its application globally. To use Harmony just choose from the existing database of instruments or introduce your own via the user-friendly interface. If you are working on a study that requires the comparison of AUDIT-10 vs DASI, utilizing Harmony will undoubtedly save you hours of time and effort. Visit https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app, drag and drop your PDF instruments, and let the AI-driven system do the rest. Seamlessly analyze, compare, and harmonize data from AUDIT-10 and DASI with Harmony, the tool that revolutionizes data harmonization in psychology and social science.
